resources.string: Do you really want to delete this desktop/web session?
To connect, download the desktop app (https://threema.ch/download) or open the web client (%s) on your computer, and tap the button below to scan the QR code displayed on your computer screen.

The desktop app and the web client allow you to chat from your PC or notebook while giving you full access to all your contacts, media and chats, even past conversations.

All communication between phone and PC is fully end-to-end encrypted and uses a direct connection if both phone and PC are on the same network.

Please note: The desktop app / web client may cause some additional battery drain while it is active. You can enable or disable it at any time.
Start desktop app / web client now
Please scan the QR code displayed on the PC.
Your app does not support this version of the desktop app / web client. Please update Threema for Android to the latest version.

Your app does not support this version of the desktop app / web client. Please download the latest version of the desktop app, or ask the administrator of your web client to upgrade to the latest version.
Your app does not support this version of the desktop app / web client. Please use the current version of the desktop app / web client.
The session of the QR code you scanned already exists. Please relaunch the desktop app / reload the web client, and try again.
Would you like to start this session now?
Server is not approved by the administrator.
Are you sure that you want to stop and remove all sessions?
Start this tool to debug problems with setting up a connection to the desktop app or the web client
Tap on «Start» to launch the test.
Done. If you experience problems with the connection build-up to the desktop app or the web client, please send this log to Threema support.
